idea-plugin.name: LiteralEnum Support
idea-plugin.description:
Static typing support for LiteralEnum in Python.

LiteralEnum Support for PyCharm
Adds static typing support for LiteralEnum classes. This plugin improves Python type checking by treating LiteralEnum as:
  • Type position: an exhaustive Literal[...] union
  • Value position: a normal runtime class (attributes, iteration, validation)
Useful for:
  • HTTP methods, event names, protocol tokens
  • APIs that accept string literals but need exhaustiveness
  • Projects using the literalenum package
Project: https://github.com/modularizer/literalenum
